channel.title: A couple more Questions
channel.description:
hey guys, me again :P
On my 317, i need to know how to do these things.
#1- how do i add an object into the server permanently, and when i click on it, it gives the player money! (Thief Stall)
#2- in my spellbook teles, how do i change the name? On my ardy one it says "Deep wildy pking areas" and i want it to say "Training areas"
#3-How do i change prices in shops?
#4-How do i permanently spawn npc's? and make them tele the player to wherever i want when they click on the npc.
#5-Lastly, how do i make npc's talk?
Thanks in advance, Sorry im a noob :(

item.title: A couple more Questions
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“sinji76, post:1, topic:365860”]hey guys, me again

On my 317, i need to know how to do these things.

Add an object into the server permanently, and when i click on it, it gives the player money! (Thief Stall)

Next, in my spellbook teles, how do i change the name? On my ardy one it says “Deep wildy pking areas” and i want it to say “Training areas”

How do i change prices in shops?

Next, How do i permanently spawn npc’s? and make them tele the player to wherever i want when they click on the npc.

Lastly, how do i make npc’s talk?

Thanks in advance, Sorry im a noob :([/quote]

To change teleport names try texthandler.java (Search for what you want to change). Too permanently spawn npcs via command look here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Also, for thieving

if (objectID == ID) 
{
addItem(##.##);
sM("You get ###");
} // you can add timers etc

Bare in mind most 317’s use a variable called ‘ThiefStall’. On the making Npcs talk I’m going to assume you mean yell? I believe that’ll be in Npchandler.java search for something like ‘Moo!’ can’t really remember too well.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple more Questions
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

  • You can change the prices of items in Item.Cfg

  • You can make NPCS in Autospawn.Cfg

  • You can make NPCS talk in NPCHANDLER.Java

(Sorry I didn’t answer all but I’m in a rush to leave)

Read full topic

item.title: A couple more Questions
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Edit it, then number them 1-*, so I don’t get confused.

Read full topic
